name: 行銷專題研究
goals: 瞭解部落格行銷與電影行銷的行銷議題
培養掌握研究議題與研究方法的能力
建立從事專題研究的能力
syllabus:
Part 1: Research Methodologies (Experimentation,Survey,Qualitative Research)

W1 Opening

W2 Experimentation 1/2

W3 Experimentation 2/2

W4 Survey 1/2

W5 Qualitative research methods

W6 Data in marketing

Part 2: Marketing Strategies 1/2 (4Ps, Strategic analysis)

W7 Brands and product strategies

W8 Consumer behavior

W9 **Mid-term exam**

W10 Promotion strategies

W11 Electronic commerce

W12 Channel and pricing strategies

Part 3: Marketing Strategies 2/2 (High-tech,Cultural/creative,Fashion…etc.)

W13 High-tech marketing 1/2

W14 High-tech marketing 2/2

W15 Luxury/Fashion marketing

W16 Cultural and creative industries marketing

W17Miscellaneous topics

W18 **Final exam**
prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
